ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of MICHAEL VANDERGRIFT of Ottawa, Ontario, Deputy Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs, to be concurrently Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet (Plans and Consultations), Privy Council Office, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 10, 2022.
